message.content:
cs.DC, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.NE, cs.DS

The paper discusses the application of Reinforcement Learning (RL) to the autoscaling problem in Cloud Computing, which involves decision-making in a dynamic and uncertain environment. This makes it likely to belong to the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) sub-category. Additionally, the paper extensively discusses the use of RL, which is a subfield of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and the decision-making aspect of the problem suggests it could also belong to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. The use of RL also involves the use of neural networks, which could place it in the Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) sub-category. Finally, the paper involves the comparison of different proposals and the use of taxonomies, which suggests it could also belong to the Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category.
